articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: All the ways Apple TV boxes do—and mostly don’t—track you - Ars Technica
articles.description: Using the Apple TV app or an Apple account means giving Apple more data, though.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump says he will withdraw nomination of Musk associate Jared Isaacman to lead NASA - NPR
articles.description: In a post on social media late Saturday, Trump said he was withdrawing Isaacman's nomination after a  "thorough review" of the tech billionaire's "prior associations."
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump announced late Saturday that he is withdrawing the nomination of tech billionaire Jared Isaacman, an associate of Trump adviser Elon Musk, to lead NASA, saying he re… [+1645 chars]
